title: Which is the best Creative Writing MFA program in Canada? - Quora

response.answer_text: Masters of Fine Arts? I think you can do this at U.B.C.O. or U.B.C. U.B.C. is the ultimate choice but you need at least 85% average in high school to get in. I only had 75% so got thrown into U.B.C.O. Best of luck. With writes, -Andy Ruffett
